RECOMMENDATION
To improve your RAG system, focus on enhancing the Rewriter component, particularly for conversational and double questions, as these scored significantly lower than other types. Additionally, address the performance inconsistencies across topics, especially with Emergency Response Procedures and Staff Duty Shifts, to ensure balanced knowledge base utilization.
